title: Your favorite and least favorite skin for your main
body:
I figured that making such thread can be a nice way for me to know you guys, and can lead to a nice discussion.
So, I'm a Draven main, with my favorite skin for him being the Primetime Draven, mainly because it's a legendary skin at a cost of 975 rp.
My least favorite skin for him is the soul reaver draven, because he has no mustache, and playing the glorious executioner without a mustache is a complete disgrace imo.
https://media.giphy.com/media/YPIrsRqqO7oB2/200w.gif
